statement.tex:
\text{Find the result of the following matrix addition}\\ \left[\begin{array}{cc} a^2 + b^2 & b^2 + c^2 \\ a^2 + c^2 & a^2 + b^2 \end{array} \right] +
\left[\begin{array}{rr} 2ab & 2bc \\ -2ac & -2ab \end{array} \right]

step.context: \text{Under what condition, the sum of two matrices}\\ A_{m \times n} \text{ and } B_{p \times q} \text{ is defined?}
step.tex: \text{When both matrices have the same order i.e.}\\ m = p \text{ and } n = q

\text{When both matrices have the same number}\\ \text{of elements i.e. }\quad
m \times n = p \times q

step.context: \text{If S = $A_{m \times n} + B_{ m \times n} $ then, what is the}\\ \text{order of resultant matrix S?}

\text{Find the result of the following matrix addition}\\ \left[\begin{array}{cc} a^2 + b^2 & b^2 + c^2 \\ a^2 + c^2 & a^2 + b^2 \end{array} \right] +
\left[\begin{array}{rr} 2ab & 2bc \\ -2ac & -2ab \end{array} \right]
step.tex:
= \left[\begin{array}{cc} a^2 + b^2 + 2ab \quad & b^2 + c^2 + 2bc \\ a^2 + c^2 - 2ac \quad & a^2 + b^2 - 2ab \end{array} \right] \\=
\left[\begin{array}{cc} (a+b)^2\quad & (b-c)^2 \\ (a-c)^2 \quad & (a-b)^2 \end{array} \right]

= \left[\begin{array}{cc} a^2 + b^2 + b^2 + c^2 \quad & 2ab + 2bc \\ a^2 + c^2 + a^2 + b^2 \quad & -2ac - 2ab \end{array} \right] \\ = \left[\begin{array}{cc} a^2 + 2b^2 + c^2 \quad & 2b(a + c) \\ 2a^2 + c^2 + b^2 \quad & -2a(b +c) \end{array} \right]
